participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys spending time with animals and finds solace in organizing.
participant_1.background: I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better. My dad was a cop until he was killed. I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog. I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies. I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Introverted and caring, enjoys spending time with her child and animals, but values her own space.
participant_2.background: I have a baby monitor to keep an eye on my little one. I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests. I still love my cat despite all this. My hair is brown and curly. Comic Con is not my thing.

content.text: I am doing well! What about you?
I am doing well too. I just got back from a skatepark and I am tired.
That is awesome! I wish I could skate but I have a baby.
That is understandable. I have a dog but he is old and can not skate with me.
I love dogs! Do you have a picture of him?
I do! Here is a picture of him with my alpacas. He loves them!
That is so cute! I love your alpacas too! They look so soft.
Thanks! They are very soft. I like to spend time with them when I am stressed.
I can see why! They look like they would be great listeners.
They are! They always seem to know when I am upset and they make me feel better.
That is amazing. I am glad you have them in your life.
